name: Collapsed Void
description:
A sequel to "Escaping Gravity", we continue with Archit's story but from a different perspective... See what happens after Archit's adventure on Mars with this point and click game made in GBStudio!

Browser Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Z - Confirm / Enter

X - Cancel

Credits:

Sodor - Music, Art, Programming

Extra Credits:

Special thanks to the GBStudio community. Without their helpful tips and tutorials, this game would not be possible!

Special thanks to community members on Twitch for being so supportive while this was in development!

Special thanks to YOU for checking out my work!
